c:atomType.name: PointingMode
c:atomType.c:documentation: The pointing mode controls the way that certain pointer events are handled for purposes of detecting whether the pointer is pointing to a certain visual element.

c:atom.name: Over
c:atom.c:documentation: The mouse is considered to point to a visual element when it is over it.

c:atom.name: Near
c:atom.c:documentation: The mouse is considered to point to a visual element if it is at a certain minimum distance of it and there is no other visual element at a closer distance.
